sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Item.css" const Item = ({prods}) => { const [stock,setStock] = useState(0) let stockAct = prods.Stock - stock let myProds = prods.Stock let Total = stock return (
{prods.Nombre}

{prods.Descripcion}

Go somewhere

En el carro: {Total}

); };

{prods.link}

Disponibles {stockAct}

export default Item;
